title: Where is uni.inc file?
content:
In the IDA Pro generated asm code, I see this line: 
include uni.inc ; see unicode subdir of ida for info on unicode
I don't find unicode subdir nor do I find uni.inc file... Could any one give me some help? Thank you!

comments.text: First I thought it's in the SDK, but it isn't. Not FLAIR or IDS Utils or loadint either.
What happens when you remove that "include uni.inc" line and try to compile the code?
@JasonGeffner I think there are some issues with unicode data definition like aA unicode "aAa". There is obvious no definition of this macro when using masm to re-assemble it.
@JasonGeffner thank you! eventually I rewrite this macro, using masm's unicode macro
